charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Zabuza (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) has been summoned from the dead against his will. His unique abilities will surely be put to use on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Demon Shroud
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) uses Demon Shroud. For 4 turns damage dealt to Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) will be reduced by 10 and he will be immune to enemy affliction damage and enemy stun effects. Executioner Strike will deal an additional 10 damage during this skill.

abilities.name: Executioner Blade Absorption
abilities.description: Using Executioner Blade Absorption Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) steals 10 health and removes 1 bloodline or ninjutsu chakra from one enemy.

abilities.name: Executioner Strike
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) uses Executioner Strike on one enemy dealing 35 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Mist Kunai Guard
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
